website_summaries.verdict: This affordable inflatable pool doubles as a lounger and is a nice option for kids' play or adult relaxation.
pros: Suitable for parents and their kids, as this inflatable pool features 2 built-in lounge seats for adults to relax while youngsters play
Simple to inflate and fill, and has a drain plug that makes removing water just as easy
cons: Like any inflatable pool, air leakage and punctures are possible
Some owners wish it had cup holders

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. We set it up on our deck. Only thing we wish it had was cup holders. But it’s Not that big of a deal. Perfect for a hot day and just lounging
customer_reviews.author: Mommytotwogirls

customer_reviews.title: Only used 3 times in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We had to get an air compressor to fill it because there is no way to sit there and blow it up. We have only used it 3 times and have had it for less than 2 weeks. It keeps losing air and we don’t why so water keeps flowing out. That’s ridiculous I know blow up pools don’t last long but they should last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Came quicker than the estimated delivery time. Filled up no issues. Great in lieu of a real pool! Plan to use this with a couple of my friends to relax and have some drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Anderson

customer_reviews.title: came with hole
customer_reviews.text: Blew up the pool on the first day and added water and there was already a hole in one of the sides
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The envy of our friends in a pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this! My daughter purchased this in the beginning of the pandemic. It was the only pool she could find! We are so happy with it and were the envy of our friends this summer. I was perfect for 2. Comfortable. Easy to set up. Easy to put away after the season. A little difficult to drain because the drain is on the bottom. I think it should be on the bottom of a side because the valve wouldn't stay open and, being on the bottom, the water won't drain unless we held the side up which is why I only gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ALFbrewer

customer_reviews.title: Sprung a leak
customer_reviews.text: Nice size pool and like the seating feature. However, it developed a slow leak after a short time. Would collapse overnight or after about 6 hours on one side and water would leak out over the side. I could not find where air was leaking out. I had to purchase a small pump and blow it back up every morning and add new water. Not worth what we paid. Found out real cost was much lower but price went up a lot during pandemic. Recommend they include a pre-sized solar cover option with it since there is no cover except to order a round one and cut to fit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool for deck.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves playing in the pool. I appreciate the seat areas. Wish their was a cover available for it though.
customer_reviews.author: June Callahan

customer_reviews.title: ENJOYED IT
customer_reviews.text: ENJOYED IT BUT HAD TO KEEP PUTTING AIR IN IT. BUT WE DO LIKE IT SO WE WILL KEEP IT, JUST NEEDS AIR ABOUT EVERY HOUR OR SO.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA J. KEMP

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Good sized
customer_reviews.text: Drain is on bottom, good luck draining. Slightly too big to dump and refill. Be prepared to buy shock and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Pools don’t work when they have holes!!
customer_reviews.text: Came with 3 holes. Lovely. Now I get to somehow cram it back in the box to return it. Smh.
customer_reviews.author: Tarrah Lennert

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the pool
customer_reviews.text: Kids love swimming in this pool and just having a fun time they swim almost everyday. Just keep sharp object away from pool.
customer_reviews.author: stromy87

customer_reviews.title: Shipped quick
customer_reviews.text: I received it couple of days ago but today we decided to set it up for the kids and for some reason it would not hold the air 😢😢😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaked from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized pool but we have to pump air into it every day otherwise it will start leaking all over the yard. It's a pain but if we don't do it, all that water is wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Server

customer_reviews.title: Cute/sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Decent size pool my 2 yr old loved sitting on the seat while her two other sisters swam. The material is sturdy I cannot tell you how many times my daughter bounced on the side and there was not a single leak.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia k.

customer_reviews.title: Positive review for seller
customer_reviews.text: I am leaving a positive review for the seller. After the pool got a hole in the liner around the drain plug, the seller did issue a refund. This would have been a great pool, but we only got to use it 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: christy dease

customer_reviews.title: Little over priced but good pool
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoyed the pool for about a month and then the dog put a hole in it while jumping in. It was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this pool and set up for the kids. They have swam in it twice and it already has a hole in it. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret T. Klass

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. I have had it filled for about a month with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very thin material, don't buy.  It lasted two days with children
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size but the durability with children is terrible. Just a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pops easy
customer_reviews.text: At first was a good buy but it got a hole easy and I can not find it so only was able to use it for a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: Nichol gucciardo

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong item then what is listed and what is shown on the box. Headache to get to a resolution
customer_reviews.author: Andriana huerta

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Holes after one use and another hole after using it 3 times
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Good family Pool
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Is a decent size for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Tran

customer_reviews.title: So far ,so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My daughter absolutely loves it and I love being able to sun bathe while she plays!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Litteral

customer_reviews.title: Where did my real Inatex go?
customer_reviews.text: We have used Intex several tímes. Never a problem. Til now. This one seems to have doubled in price. Thanks again COVID and everyone wants a pool in backyard for the kids. It’s liner seemed thinner than usual. Plus you are recommended not to fill up above half?! It’s a pool not a birdbath. Anyways $200 for $10 of reused Korean plastic didn’t make the cut this time. Happy 4th!
customer_reviews.author: Enlightened One

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose the cap!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool. Used one whole summer and cleaned it for winter storage. Planned on using it for at least another summer but I lost the cap for the air fill. Desperately tried to find a replacement but no luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This lounge pool is awesome!!! My second summer with it, easy to blow up and haven’t had any issues with leaking. I highly recommend. I will be purchasing another again 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Severely overpriced. Deflates within 24 hours and has leaked since the first day, but it so huge you can’t find the leak. Had to buy an air compressor to blow up. It’s great when it is first blown up, but doesn’t last more than one use.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lambert

product_meta.title: Intex Inflatable 2-Seat Swim Center Family Lounge Pool
product_meta.description: Relax and keep cool with the Intex Family Lounge Pool. An ideal addition to any backyard, it holds as much as 221 gallons of water, giving you plenty of space to immerse yourself. With two comfortable backrests and cushioned seats, this Intex 2-Seat pool allows you to sit back and watch as little ones play. The drain plug ensures quick water drainage when the day is over, so there's nothing getting in the way of indulging yourself any day of the week. Also included with this Intex above-ground pool is a repair patch for quick fixes, so the fun doesn't have to stop when there is a small rip. Just fill it up and take a seat or splash around until the day is done. The Intex Family Lounge Pool transforms your backyard and makes the summer special for the whole family. Intex Inflatable 2-Seat Swim Center Family Lounge Pool: Suitable for family to relax and keep cool for the summer Constructed with a comfortable backrest and 2 cushioned seats
feature_bullets: Intex family lounge pool is a fun addition to any backyard
Includes a drain plug for faster water drainage and a repair patch for convenience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars138 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
